entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
